programme.title: We Are Your Friends, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: An aspiring disc jockey (Zac Efron) befriends a veteran DJ (Wes Bentley) who shows him the ropes, but jeopardizes it all when he falls for the man's young girlfriend (Emily Ratajkowski).

programme.title: Gone With the Wind, (1939, Romance)
programme.desc: Presented as originally released in 1939. Includes themes and character depictions which may be offensive and problematic to contemporary audiences. A Southern belle struggles to return her family's estate to its original glory after the Civil War.

programme.title: Spaceship Earth, (2020, Documentary)
programme.desc: In 1991 eight visionaries embark on a two-year experiment to quarantine themselves inside Biosphere 2 -- a self-engineered replica of Earth's ecosystem.

programme.title: Eye in the Sky, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: A lieutenant general (Alan Rickman) and a colonel (Helen Mirren) face political opposition after ordering a drone missile strike to take out a group of suicide bombers in Nairobi, Kenya.

programme.title: Scream 2, (1997, Horror)
programme.desc: A masked killer continues to pursue a California student (Neve Campbell) and her friends at an Ohio college.

programme.title: Black Adam, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Bestowed with the almighty powers of the gods, Black Adam's unique form of justice, born out of rage, is challenged by modern-day heroes who form the Justice Society: Hawkman, Dr. Fate, Atom Smasher and Cyclone.

programme.title: St. Vincent, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: An unlikely bond forms between a single woman's 12-year-old son (Jaeden Lieberher) and the boozy misanthrope (Bill Murray) who lives next door.

programme.title: Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla, (1974, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An Okinawan monster-god helps Godzilla defeat his bionic double.

programme.title: Vampires Suck, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: In a spoof of "Twilight" and other films, a pale vampire and a muscular werewolf try to win the heart of a beautiful teen.

programme.title: Jonah Hex, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Jonah Hex has one foot in the natural world and one in the supernatural. His unusual nature gives him the ability to track down anyone, so the Army makes him an offer. It will erase the warrants on his head if he finds Quentin Turnbull.

programme.title: The Devil's Rejects, (2005, Horror)
programme.desc: A vengeful sheriff and two bounty hunters track a murderous family (Sid Haig, Bill Moseley, Sheri Moon Zombie) on the run.

programme.title: A United Kingdom, (2016, History)
programme.desc: In the 1940s, Prince Seretse Khama of Botswana shocks the world when he marries a white woman from London.

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Professor X (James McAvoy) and Raven (Jennifer Lawrence) lead a team of young X-Men to stop the immortal mutant Apocalypse (Oscar Isaac) from destroying mankind.

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Professor X (James McAvoy) and Raven (Jennifer Lawrence) lead a team of young X-Men to stop the immortal mutant Apocalypse (Oscar Isaac) from destroying mankind.

programme.title: It Follows, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: Following a strange sexual encounter, a teenager (Maika Monroe) has disturbing visions and the inescapable feeling that someone -- or something -- is stalking her.

programme.title: Nine Lives, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: A workaholic billionaire (Kevin Spacey) tries to communicate with his family when a bizarre turn of events traps him inside the body of a cat named Mr. Fuzzypants.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: The resourceful detective (Robert Downey Jr.) and his astute partner, Dr. Watson (Jude Law), meet a powerful criminal, a devotee of black magic who arises from his grave.

programme.title: Almost Christmas, (2016, Christmas)
programme.desc: A beloved patriarch asks his family members for one gift this holiday season: to get along. If they can honor that wish and spend five days under the same roof without killing one another, it will be a Christmas miracle.

programme.title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: A fatherless teen starts to insinuate himself into the life of a renowned surgeon, his wife and two children. The full scope of his intent soon becomes menacingly clear when he confronts the doctor with a long-forgotten transgression.

programme.title: Black Adam, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Bestowed with the almighty powers of the gods, Black Adam's unique form of justice, born out of rage, is challenged by modern-day heroes who form the Justice Society: Hawkman, Dr. Fate, Atom Smasher and Cyclone.

programme.title: Teen Spirit, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: A shy teenager dreams of escaping her small town and pursuing her passion to sing. With the help of an unlikely mentor, she enters a local singing competition that will test her integrity, talent and ambition.

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: London publicist Edina Monsoon and best friend Patsy Stone flee to the French Riviera after accidentally knocking supermodel Kate Moss into the River Thames.

programme.title: The Lighthouse, (2019, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two lighthouse keepers try to maintain their sanity while living on a remote and mysterious New England island in the 1890s.

programme.title: Blood Father, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: An ex-convict (Mel Gibson) and his estranged daughter (Erin Moriarty) go on the run from her drug-dealing boyfriend (Diego Luna) and his vicious cartel.

programme.title: Anthropoid, (2016, History)
programme.desc: In December 1941, two Czech soldiers (Cillian Murphy, Jamie Dornan) parachute into their occupied homeland to assassinate Nazi officer Reinhard Heydrich (Detlef Bothe).

programme.title: American Ultra, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: When his secret past comes back to haunt him, a small-town stoner (Jesse Eisenberg) must use his latent, deadly skills to prevent the CIA from taking him out.

programme.title: It Comes at Night, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: After a mysterious apocalypse leaves the world with few survivors, two families are forced to share a home in an uneasy alliance to keep the outside evil at bay -- only to learn that the true horror may come from within.

programme.title: Everything, Everything, (2017, Romance)
programme.desc: Confined to her house due to an illness, a smart and imaginative 18-year-old (Amandla Stenberg) develops a budding romance with the teen (Nick Robinson) who lives next door.

programme.title: Everything, Everything, (2017, Romance)
programme.desc: Confined to her house due to an illness, a smart and imaginative 18-year-old (Amandla Stenberg) develops a budding romance with the teen (Nick Robinson) who lives next door.

programme.title: Home Again, (2017, Romance)
programme.desc: Separated from her husband, Alice lets three young men -- Harry, George and Teddy -- stay in her guesthouse. As Alice develops a budding romance with Harry, her newfound happiness comes crashing down when her ex shows up with a suitcase in his hand.

programme.title: Superman: Unbound, (2013, Animated)
programme.desc: Superman (Matt Bomer) battles Brainiac (John Noble) to save the Krypton city of Kandor, which is miniaturized and held aboard Brainiac's ship.

programme.title: A Bigger Splash, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: While vacationing on a Sicilian island with her boyfriend (Matthias Schoenaerts), a rock star (Tilda Swinton) receives an unexpected visit from an old flame (Ralph Fiennes) and his seductive daughter (Dakota Johnson).

programme.title: Scream 3, (2000, Horror)
programme.desc: Murders draw a young woman (Neve Campbell), a reporter (Courteney Cox Arquette) and an ex-policeman (David Arquette) to the set of a movie inspired by horrific events that they survived.

programme.title: Knight and Day, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: A woman (Cameron Diaz) gets ensnared in a deadly, global adventure when she becomes the reluctant partner of a fugitive spy (Tom Cruise).

programme.title: Balls Out, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: Fifth year college senior Caleb Fuller (Jake Lacy) gets his flag football team back together for one last shot at intramural football glory.

programme.title: Birds of Prey (and the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn), (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Harley Quinn faces the wrath of narcissistic crime boss Black Mask and every other thug in Gotham. But things soon even out for Harley when she becomes unexpected allies with three deadly women -- Huntress, Black Canary and Renee Montoya.

programme.title: Batman and Superman: Battle of the Super Sons, (2022, Animated)
programme.desc: On his birthday, Jonathan Kent learns his dad is Superman and that he has superpowers of his own. He also meets Damian Wayne. The two boys are forced to team up to protect their loved ones from a hostile alien force.

programme.title: The Ballad of Lefty Brown, (2017, Western)
programme.desc: A merciless cowboy sets out on a dangerous journey across the frontier, determined to do whatever it takes to avenge his longtime partner's brutal murder.

programme.title: The 9th Life of Louis Drax, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: An acclaimed neurologist (Jamie Dornan) taps into the unconscious mind of a 9-year-old boy (Aiden Longworth) who has survived nine near-death accidents.

programme.title: Good Time, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: A bank robber stops at nothing to free his brother from prison, launching himself into a nightlong odyssey through New York's dark and dangerous criminal underworld.

programme.title: Skin, (2019, Documentary)
programme.desc: Nollywood actress Beverly Naya explores Black beauty and the practice of skin bleaching in African culture.

programme.title: Sergio Leone: The Italian Who Invented America, (2022, Documentary)
programme.desc: An homage to Italian film director Sergio Leone, credited as the pioneer of the spaghetti western subgenre, featuring interviews with Quentin Tarantino, Robert De Niro and Clint Eastwood.

programme.title: Table 19, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: Dumped by the best man (Wyatt Russell), an ex-maid of honor (Anna Kendrick) must sit with a group of strangers (Craig Robinson, Lisa Kudrow) during her friend's wedding reception.

programme.title: Table 19, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: Dumped by the best man (Wyatt Russell), an ex-maid of honor (Anna Kendrick) must sit with a group of strangers (Craig Robinson, Lisa Kudrow) during her friend's wedding reception.

programme.title: House of 1000 Corpses, (2003, Horror)
programme.desc: Four travelers take refuge in the home of a clan of demented killers. Written and directed by musician Rob Zombie.

programme.title: Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla, (1974, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An Okinawan monster-god helps Godzilla defeat his bionic double.

programme.title: The Secrets We Keep, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: In post-World War II America, a woman, rebuilding her life in the suburbs with her husband, kidnaps her neighbor and seeks vengeance for the heinous war crimes she believes he committed against her.

programme.title: Spaceship Earth, (2020, Documentary)
programme.desc: In 1991 eight visionaries embark on a two-year experiment to quarantine themselves inside Biosphere 2 -- a self-engineered replica of Earth's ecosystem.

programme.title: Gifted, (2017, Drama)
programme.desc: A man (Chris Evans) wages a legal battle against his mother (Lindsay Duncan) for custody of his orphaned niece (Mckenna Grace), a young mathematics prodigy who wants to live with him.

programme.title: Low Tide, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: When teenager Alan and his younger brother find a bag of gold coins in a dead man's island home, they try to hide it from their friends -- but one of them, suspicious and violently unpredictable, is willing to do anything to get the money.

programme.title: The Disaster Artist, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: The incredible true story of aspiring filmmaker and Hollywood outsider Tommy Wiseau as he and his best friend defiantly pursue their dreams and embark on the hilarious odyssey of making the now-infamous, cult classic "The Room.".

programme.title: The Kill Team, (2019, War)
programme.desc: When a young U.S. soldier in Afghanistan witnesses other recruits killing civilians under the direction of a sadistic sergeant, he begins to fear that the men he's serving with might be the ones to kill him.

programme.title: Blue Beetle, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: Jaime Reyes finds himself in possession of an ancient relic of alien biotechnology called the Scarab. When the Scarab chooses Jaime to be its symbiotic host, he's bestowed with a suit of armor that's capable of extraordinary and unpredictable powers.

programme.title: State of Play, (2009, Thriller)
programme.desc: An investigative journalist (Russell Crowe) stumbles into a cover-up of gigantic proportions as he and his partner probe the murder of a beloved congressman's (Ben Affleck) mistress.

programme.title: D...: The Musical, (2023, Musical)
programme.desc: Two self-obsessed businessmen discover they're long-lost identical twins and come together to plot the reunion of their divorced parents.

programme.title: Villeneuve Pironi: Racing's Untold Tragedy, (2022, Documentary)
programme.desc: The story of Canadian Formula 1 legend Gilles Villeneuve and French star Didier Pironi, two fearless Ferrari Formula 1 drivers, forever torn apart by a historic and hugely controversial moment in time.

programme.title: Big Miracle, (2012, Adventure)
programme.desc: A reporter (John Krasinski) in small-town Alaska and his former lover (Drew Barrymore), an environmentalist, try to form an international coalition to rescue three ice-trapped whales.

programme.title: Rain Man, (1988, Drama)
programme.desc: A wheeler-dealer (Tom Cruise) meets his brother (Dustin Hoffman), an institutionalized autistic-savant, heir to $3 million.

programme.title: Heaven's Gate, (1980, Western)
programme.desc: A well-educated marshal defends immigrant settlers against cattle barons in 1890s Johnson County, Wyoming.

programme.title: Rob Roy, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: The Scottish folk hero (Liam Neeson) fights for clan and honor, hunted by vile aristocrats in the 1700s.

programme.title: The Time Machine, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A scientist (Guy Pearce) travels into the future and meets a race of people who fear hideous monsters living under the ground.

programme.title: The Golden Child, (1986, Comedy)
programme.desc: A professional child-finder (Eddie Murphy) is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan boy from a shape-shifting villain (Charles Dance).

programme.title: Three Thousand Years of Longing, (2022, Fantasy)
programme.desc: While attending a conference in Istanbul, Dr. Alithea Binnie happens to encounter a djinn who offers her three wishes in exchange for his freedom. Eventually, she's beguiled and makes a wish that surprises them both.

programme.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan, (1982, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Kirk (William Shatner), Spock (Leonard Nimoy) and the Enterprise crew battle an old foe (Ricardo Montalban) who blames Kirk for the death of his wife.

programme.title: Apollo 13, (1995, History)
programme.desc: Astronauts Jim Lovell, Fred Haise and Jack Swigert try to return to Earth after an explosion aborts the April 1970 moonshot.

programme.title: The Aviator, (2004, History)
programme.desc: During the 1930s and '40s, wealthy industrialist Howard Hughes (Leonardo DiCaprio) gains fame as a movie producer, airplane designer and pilot.

programme.title: Into the Wild, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: A top student and athlete leaves his middle-class life to venture into Alaska, only to meet people who will eventually shape his values and life.

programme.title: Godfather of Harlem
programme.desc: An attack on Bumpy's family forces him to team up with unlikely allies to retaliate against Joe Colombo; Margaret stays with Elise and the Panthers and helps Jerome; Pino betrays Stella; Colombo plans a Civil Rights rally in Central Park.

programme.title: The Great Raid, (2005, War)
programme.desc: In 1944 Lt. Col. Henry Mucci (Benjamin Bratt) leads a U.S. battalion to rescue more than 500 prisoners of war from a Japanese camp.

programme.title: The Great Raid, (2005, War)
programme.desc: In 1944 Lt. Col. Henry Mucci (Benjamin Bratt) leads a U.S. battalion to rescue more than 500 prisoners of war from a Japanese camp.

programme.title: The Portable Door, (2023, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A man lands an internship at a mysterious London firm with unconventional employees, including the charismatic CEO who is incorporating modern corporate strategy into ancient magical practices.

programme.title: The Deep House, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: While diving in a remote French lake, two YouTubers who specialize in underwater exploration videos discover a house submerged in deep waters. Their dive turns into a nightmare when they discover the house was the scene of atrocious crimes.

programme.title: The Indian in the Cupboard, (1995, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A magic cabinet brings to life a 9-year-old's (Hal Scardino) action figures, including a 3-inch-high Indian named Little Bear (Litefoot).

programme.title: Doubt, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: Suspicions of child abuse fuel a traditionalist nun's (Meryl Streep) personal crusade against a popular priest (Philip Seymour Hoffman) who wants to reform her school's strict customs.

programme.title: Footloose, (2011, Musical)
programme.desc: A rebellious teen (Kenny Wormald) incurs the wrath of a much-loved clergyman (Dennis Quaid) by challenging the town's ban on loud music and dancing.

programme.title: An Officer and a Gentleman, (1982, Drama)
programme.desc: A hardened loner (Richard Gere) shapes up for a military drill instructor (Louis Gossett Jr.) and a factory girl (Debra Winger) from town.

programme.title: The Natural, (1984, Drama)
programme.desc: The almost mythical ability of a middle-aged baseball player rockets a major-league team toward the 1939 pennant.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: A therapist (Robin Williams), a mathematician and working-class roughs vie for the soul of a janitor (Matt Damon) with a genius IQ.

programme.title: John Grisham's The Rainmaker, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: A Memphis law school graduate (Matt Damon) aids a battered wife (Claire Danes) and fights a corporate lawyer (Jon Voight) for insurance benefits for a dying man.

programme.title: Challengers, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: Tensions run high when a grand slam tennis champion finds himself standing across the net from the once-promising, now burnt-out Patrick, his former best friend and his wife's former boyfriend.

programme.title: Saint Maud, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Maud, an unstable, newly devout hospice nurse, becomes obsessed with saving her dying patient's soul -- but sinister forces and her own sinful past threaten her holy calling.

programme.title: Unseen, (2023, Horror)
programme.desc: Sam, a gas station clerk, receives a random call from Emily, a nearly blind woman who's running from her murderous ex in the woods. Using a phone, Sam becomes Emily's only chance for survival as she guides the terrified woman through a video call.

programme.title: Battle of Britain, (1969, War)
programme.desc: With London facing almost certain annihilation, British fighter pilots defend their skies against Germany's Luftwaffe.

programme.title: Battle of Britain, (1969, War)
programme.desc: With London facing almost certain annihilation, British fighter pilots defend their skies against Germany's Luftwaffe.

programme.title: A House on the Bayou, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: Hoping for an idyllic getaway, a couple and their daughter visit a remote mansion in rural Louisiana. When suspiciously friendly neighbors show up uninvited, the weekend soon takes a sinister turn as dark secrets test the family's fragile bond.

programme.title: Overboard, (2018, Romance)
programme.desc: Kate is a single, working-class mother of three who's fired by a selfish, spoiled and wealthy Mexican playboy named Leonardo. When Leonardo falls off his yacht and wakes up with amnesia, Kate seeks payback by convincing him that they're married.

programme.title: Bottoms, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: Unpopular best friends PJ and Josie start a high school fight club to meet girls and lose their virginity. They soon find themselves in over their heads when the most popular students start beating each other up in the name of self-defense.

programme.title: Sabrina, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: Sons (Harrison Ford, Greg Kinnear) of a Long Island tycoon become romantic rivals for the chauffeur's daughter (Julia Ormond).

programme.title: Desperately Seeking Susan, (1985, Comedy)
programme.desc: A bored housewife (Rosanna Arquette) with amnesia thinks she is "Susan," a wild woman (Madonna) on the run.

programme.title: She's Out of My League, (2010, Romance)
programme.desc: An airport security agent must figure out how to make the relationship work when a beautiful, successful woman falls in love with him.

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles, (1987, Thanksgiving)
programme.desc: An ad exec (Steve Martin) and a shower-curtain-ring salesman (John Candy) become co-travelers on the way to Thanksgiving in Chicago.

programme.title: National Lampoon's Animal House, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Bluto (John Belushi), Otter and the rowdy Deltas make fools of the dean and the square Omegas at 1962 Faber College.

programme.title: O ltimo assalto, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Trs idosos veteranos do crime decidem participar de um roubo a um cofre subterrneo do depsito de jias Hatton Garden, em Londres. Com uma furadeira industrial, os criminosos planejam entrar para a Histria atravessando as paredes do cofre em dois dias.

programme.title: Codinome Cassius 7, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: A morte de um senador americano faz o ex-agente da CIA Paul abandonar a aposentadoria e se juntar a um jovem oficial do FBI em uma eletrizante operao internacional para desvendar os muitos mistrios por trs do crime.

programme.title: Sem Lei, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Um grupo de trs amigos planeja um grande roubo que acaba dando errado quando um deles se revela um traidor. Enganado, Sonny decide assumir o problema de frente e busca vingana contra o antigo parceiro.

programme.title: Longe de Casa, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: Um ex-jogador problemtico da Major League Baseball volta para casa para confrontar seu padrasto abusivo.

programme.title: Ruas Em Guerra, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Quando o implacvel Lord Rincon e sua gangue MS-13 recrutam Miguel, de 10 anos, para trabalhar como um de seus entregadores de drogas, Lucas, irmo mais velho de Miguel e que tambm trabalha para o bandido, est desesperado para manter o garoto seguro.

programme.title: Pitbull: Fora Bruta, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Na Europa Oriental, um jovem convive com a pobreza e a violncia das ruas, at que se junta ao submundo do crime, tornandose pea importante no esquema da mfia. Um policial segue no encalo dele e no vai parar at derrubar toda a rede.

programme.title: Vingana Implacvel, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Um agente da Interpol atribudo a uma fora-tarefa para combater o trfico de armas e drogas na regio dos Blcs. Quando um membro da fora-tarefa morto ele lidera a equipe em uma aventura cheia de ao enquanto vinga a morte de seu amigo.

programme.title: O Franco-Atirador, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Depois de uma longa carreira como matador de aluguel, Martin Terrier pretende se aposentar e passar o resto da vida ao lado de sua amada. Mas ele descobre que est sendo trado por pessoas de sua confiana!

programme.title: Trfico Humano, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Traumatizado pela morte de um inocente, Bradley, um assassino de aluguel, se isola da sociedade e vagueia pelas perigosas ruas de um gueto do centro da cidade em busca de sentido para sua vida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Gnio Shikamaru
programme.desc: Shikamaru enfrenta hidan sozinho, no fundo da floresta e aps gastar todo seu chakra, ele tem um ferimento profundo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Quando Se Amaldioa Algum, Cava-Se O Prprio Tmulo!
programme.desc: Naruto e a equipe kakashi chegam na hora certa para ajudar a equipe asuma. Sakura e sai receberam ordens de kakashi para ajudar shikamaru, que est lutando sozinho
programme.sub-title: Quando Se Amaldioa Algum, Cava-Se O Prprio Tmulo!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Estilo Vento: Rasen Shuriken!
programme.desc: Ino e choji ficam pasmos com novo jutsu de naruto, e kakuzu sente o perigo se aproximando. Mas ao lan-lo, o novo jutsu se dissipa antes de atingir kakuzu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Preo Do Poder
programme.desc: Naruto usa seu novo jutsu para derrotar kakuzu. Tsunade d boas-vindas na volta das equipes ao lar e manda que as equipes asuma e yamato faam uma pausa

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Determinao Do Shinobi
programme.desc: Justo quando a paz finalmente chega aldeia, surge uma informao de que o esconderijo de orochimaru foi encontrado

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Esconderijo Do Orochimaru Descoberto!
programme.desc: Naruto e jiraiya chegam s fontes termais. Como uma alternativa ao estilo vento: rasen shuriken, jiraiya sugere a naruto a colaborao de um ninjutsu com um sapo ninja.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Encontro
programme.desc: No esconderijo de orochimaru guren testemunha sasuke derrotando mil oponentes. Tendo perdido a oportunidade para ser nova hospedeira de orochimaru no passado, guren abertamente expressa seu cime em relao a sasuke

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Conectando Coraes
programme.desc: Acreditando que o novo jutsu do naruto est quase pronto, jiraiya vai investigar novas informaes sobre as aes da akatsuki

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Noite Chuvosa
programme.desc: Atrs do esconderijo, rinji e gozu descobrem que um shinobi seguiu seus passos. Kakashi e sua equipe notam que o inimigo est usando um morcego para vigilncia

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Amuletos
programme.desc: Na aldeia da folha naruto est ocupado treinando com gamakichi e gamatatsu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Inimigo Invisvel
programme.desc: A equipe yamato segue para dar reforo equipe kakashi. Bem antes de sua partida naruto recebe uma dica para aperfeioar seu novo jutsu entrando na barriga de gamatatsu

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Labirinto Dos Reflexos Distorcidos
programme.desc: Atravs dos resultados da anlise dos insetos parasitrios cristalizados, os inimigos atualmente lutando com a equipe kakashi so identificados como usurios do estilo cristal, um tipo raro de jutsu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Alvo Revelado

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Estranhos Companheiros

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Voltando Para Casa

programme.title: Galaxy Quest, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Nearly twenty years after the cult TV show Galaxy Quest was cancelled, the alumni cast is asked for help by an alien species in order to save the universe.

programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars as a brash Navy lawyer who's teamed with a gung-ho litigator (Demi Moore) in a politically explosive murder case, defending two Marines accused of killing a fellow soldier

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street, (2013, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Sex. Money. Power. Drugs. Brace yourself for a true story from legendary filmmaker Martin Scorsese. Leonardo DiCaprio stars as a young stockbroker hungry for a life of non-stop thrills, where corruption was king and more was never enough.

programme.title: Adaptation, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: Director Spike Jonze delivers a stunningly original comedy that seamlessly blends fictional characters and situations with the lives of real people. As Charlie struggles to adapt Orlean's best-selling book "The Orchid Thief".Rated: R

programme.title: Amistad, (1997, History)
programme.desc: AMISTAD is about a 1839 mutiny onboard a slave ship that is traveling towards the Northeast Coast of America. Much of the story involves a court-room drama about the slave who led the revolt.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street, (2013, Biographical Drama)

programme.title: Dragonslayer, (1981, Fantasy)

programme.title: The Return of Swamp Thing, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: NEW HD TRANSFER. Everyone's favorite muck-encrusted plant-man falls in love with Dr. Arcane's sexy daughter and must rescue her from her father's nefarious and murderous plans.

programme.title: Cherry 2000, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: What used to be the American Southwest. In this post-MAD MAX Adventureture, a woman mercenary is hired to bust into a 21st-century robot Warehouse which is operated by psychos.

programme.title: Girls Just Want to Have Fun, (1970, Musical)

programme.title: Earth Girls Are Easy, (1988, Comedy)

programme.title: Stephen King's Thinner, (1996, Supernatural Horror)

programme.title: The Haunting in Connecticut 2: Ghosts of Georgia, (2013, Supernatural Horror)

programme.title: Horns, (2014, Fantasy)

programme.desc: In the semifinals of the KC Grand Championship, it's a duel between child prodigies as Rebecca faces Leon Wilson and his fairy tale faction.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi finds Grandpa's kidnapper, but is it really a kidnapping? While Yugi unravels the truth, Rebecca starts to unravel when her dragons fall prey to Leon's fervent fables. Rebecca must think of a new plan quickly or there will be no happy ending.
programme.sub-title: A Brawl in Small Town Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Zigfried vs. Leon for the right to challenge Yugi in the KC Grand Championship Finals... but Kaiba stops the duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a battle between Zigfried and Kaiba. Zigfried quickly gains the advantage by destroying Kaiba's monsters before he can even draw them!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Yugi vs. Leon for the title of King of Games at the KC Grand Championship! Something sinister lurks in the shadows, for this duel is more than just getting the crown. Zigfried's greatest revenge will commence as his real plan is unleashed.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Leon is Zigfried's younger brother, and he'll avenge his family's loss. Leon's fairy tales are giving Yugi nightmares but the worst is yet to come as Leon has Zigfried's mysterious and special card.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Golden Castle of Stromberg is infecting the world's Duel Disks with a virus that will destroy KaibaCorp. If Yugi doesn't destroy the card, the virus program can't be stopped.

programme.title: Luffy is in an all-out, all-you-can-eat battle! As Cracker's endless stream of Biscuit Warriors marches on, Luffy's endless appetite is put to the test. Meanwhile, Reiju helps Sanji to straighten himself out before he meets his fiance.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle of Limits! Luffy and the Infinite Biscuits!

programme.title: Luffy needs to think fast in order to turn the battle in his favor - filled with biscuits, he debuts a new Gear Four attack that has lasting repercussions! Meanwhile, Chopper and Carrot find Sanji's reflection, but can they get a message to him in time?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Power of Satiety! A New Gear Four Form - Tank Man!

programme.title: Luffy finally catches up with Sanji! However, as a happy past plays before his eyes in which he, Sanji, and the crew deepened their bonds, a new page is turning in the history of the Straw Hats.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Heartbreaking Duel! Luffy vs Sanji! - Part 1

programme.title: Sanji's journey with the crew looks to be coming to an end!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Heartbreaking Duel! Luffy vs Sanji! - Part 2

programme.title: Luffy makes a solemn promise to not move from his spot until Sanji returns to him. But as Mama's army advances, that promise may prove a costly one. Meanwhile, Sanji and the Vinsmokes come face to face with Big Mom and his bride-to-be Pudding!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Storm of Revenge! An Enraged Army Comes to Attack!

programme.title: Luffy stands his ground and waits for his friend to return! But the vengeful army washes over him - only a true friend can step in to turn the tide of battle! Meanwhile, Sanji and Pudding discuss their marriage - and come to a startling conclusion!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The End of the Adventure! Sanji's Resolute Proposal!

programme.title: Luffy puts his all into battling Big Mom's vengeful army, however, their skills combined prove too formidable. Meanwhile, Sanji goes to Big Mom herself to bargain for the Straw Hats lives - with shocking results!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I'll Wait Here! Luffy vs. the Enraged Army!

programme.title: Chopper and Carrot are captured by Brulee and strung up for dinner! But Chopper sees a chance to free himself! Meanwhile, Brook and Pedro launch a plan to reach the Ponegliffs - a daring game of chance!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Invading the Chateau! Reach the Road Ponegliff!

programme.title: Pekoms creates a diversion for Brook to set his plan into action. Meanwhile, Luffy continues to goad Big Mom into a fight, and Pudding begins to have stirrings of rebellion herself!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Fateful Confrontation! Luffy and Big Mom!

programme.title: Just when Luffy and Nami are in Big Mom's grasp, Pudding arrives, but with news that they aren't expecting - meanwhile Brook and Chopper both make headway getting out of their own jams!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Shout of the Soul! Brook and Pedro's Lightning Operation!

programme.title: Sanji hopes his wedding with Pudding will solve the Straw Hat's predicament - but Pudding secretly plans to to avoid the marriage, sharing a secret with Luffy. Meanwhile, Brook comes face to face with Big Mom herself!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy tries desperately to free himself as the risk of his own well-being! Meanwhile, Chopper and Carrot continue to search the mirror universe, Brook squares off against Big Mom, and Pedro's past is revealed!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The History of the Left Eye! Pedro vs. Baron Tamago!

programme.title: Luffy struggles to break himself free as Sanji falls deeper in love with the idea of marrying Pudding... But the mask falls off and the deadly charade of Big Mom is revealed as the depths of her treachery come to light!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Moist Cigarette! The Night Before Sanji's Wedding!

programme.title: Brook continues his all-out struggle against Big Mom, but his secret weapon might not be enough to save him! Meanwhile, an unexpected ally from the past comes to the rescue!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Undaunted Soul! Brook vs. Big Mom!

programme.title: Jimbei arrives on the scene and works to free Luffy and Nami! Meanwhile Sanji confronts his sister with the awful truth of Pudding, and she confides in him the powerful secret of their mother's undying love!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Brook finds himself totally at the whim of Big Mom, and comes face to face with her brutal love! Meanwhile, Pedro reveals his explosive plan to create a distraction!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To Reach Sanji! Luffy's Vengeful Hell-bent Dash!

programme.title: Chopper and Carrot use the mirror dimension to get in touch with Nami and Jimbei! Luffy makes it through more obstacles to learn that he just missed Sanji! Meanwhile, Sanji wonders alone about the best course of action.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Chateau in Turmoil! Luffy, to the Rendezvous!

programme.title: Brook hears Big Mom's plan firsthand as she shares her intentions with Pudding in front of him! Meanwhile, Big Mom's agents believe most of the Straw Hats to be under control, but doubt besets Montd'Or.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Deciding to Say Goodbye! Sanji and his Straw-Hat Bento!

programme.title: Nami and the others finally find Brook in the mirror dimension - but he's in the most inopportune of places! Can they challenge the sleeping Mama and rescue their friend? Meanwhile, Luffy is waylaid on his way back to the rendezvous!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Emperor Rolls Over! Rescue Brook Mission!

programme.title: Luffy puts up a valiant fight in order to keep his word to Sanji! But will he be able to last until Sanji arrives at the rendezvous? Meanwhile, Jimbei shares the awful truth about the wedding with the other Straw Hats.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Rendezvous! Luffy, a One-on-One at His Limit!

programme.title: Sanji and Luffy meet finally - and while he is happy to feed Luffy to replenish his energy, Sanji's explanation of what actions he must take baffles Luffy! The crucial decision, to turn his back on his friends or his family, tears Sanji apart!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The newly reunited Luffy and Sanji hear from the rest of the Straw Hats in the mirror dimension! Then, Jimbei starts telling them about Capone "Gang" Bege and proposes a shocking plan to take down Big Mom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sanji Comes Back! Crash! The Tea Party from Hell!

programme.title: The Straw Hats put Jimbei's plan into action and approach Bege with the possibility of an alliance. But before they are granted an audience, they must make themselves presentable!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Secret Meeting! Luffy vs. the Fire Tank Pirates!

programme.title: The proposed alliance between the Straw Hats and Bege unfolds! A gaseous blast from the past, Gastino, a member of Bege's team, reveals the secret weapon that the team plans to use against the Emperor!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Deadly Pact! Luffy & Bege's Allied Forces!

programme.title: Now, the assassination plan of Big Mom is all set and everyone starts preparing for the Tea Party. Montd'Or finds one of his crewmates, Bobbin the Disposer, dead, and suspects Sanji and Luffy of the crime.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Engages in a Secret Maneuver! The Wedding Full of Conspiracies Starts Soon!

programme.title: The day has arrived! Guests from the criminal underground pour in droves, but some have their own agendas to settle! Big Mom's sons, however, stand in their way and show them what they've got! Meanwhile, Luffy is preparing for his own plan!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Family Gets Together! The Hellish Tea Party Starts!

programme.title: Final preparations abound on all sides and multiple plots start to come together! But can Sanji keep his nerve and go through with the plan? Or will Pudding's beauty prove too enchanting?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Broken Couple! Sanji and Pudding Enter!

programme.title: All plans go into action as the moment of the wedding arrives - but as the veil is lifted on Pudding's grotesque face, all hell breaks loose and unexpected circumstances mean chaos at the altar! Meanwhile, Luffy charges in, adding to the mayhem!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Kiss! The Mission to Assassinate the Emperor Kicks Off!

programme.title: The plan is launched! Big Mom falls to pieces as the wedding - and the wedding cake - are destroyed and a slew of Luffys are wreaking havoc around the site. But just when Luffy gets in trouble, Jimbei confronts Big Mom bravely!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Returning the Sake Cup! The Manly Jimbei Pays His Debt!

programme.title: The plan is in full swing however - Big Mom is pushed past the edge of sanity and can't even bring herself to act. Meanwhile, her children make a move against Germa and Pudding takes up her original aim of killing Sanji!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Mission Failed?! The Big Mom Pirates Strike Back!

programme.title: The plot is in full swing as Luffy dashes towards Big Mom to show her the broken portrait again! Sanji makes an effort to free his family and wins the respect of his sister, and Big Mom loses her wits!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The tragic and sad history of Big Mom is revealed! From abandonment, rescue, and again to ruin, Big Mom's voracious hunger has brought her into conflict with others from the very beginning!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Mom's Secret! The Giant's Island Elbaph and a Little Monster!

programme.title: Linlin enrages the Giants as she slays their respected warrior - but Mother throws herself on their mercy and begs for clemency for her beloved Linlin, forcing the troupe to leave Elbaph for good.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Birth of Mom! The Day That Carmel Vanished!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko has stolen something from a man named Pycal, and he wants it back. Pycal is a magician who is able to shoot flames from his hands, walk on air, and deflect bullets with ease. Lupin goes up against Pycal in hopes of saving Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: The Man They Called a Magician

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A boat collision ruins Lupin and Fujiko's quiet boating expedition. They discover a woman named Linda in the other boat just as gunmen on a larger boat attack them.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko successfully pull off a heist; that is until Zenigata manages to shoot Lupin with a tranquilizer dart. Zenigata hauls Lupin off to jail. Despite Fujiko's best efforts, she cannot break Lupin out of prison.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: With the help of some quick gunplay by his partner Jigen, Lupin takes on the world in elaborate heists, classic car chases, and nasty explosions. Fujiko, a buxom redhead with a penchant for betrayal, always gets tangled up in Lupin's capers.
programme.sub-title: The Coming of Goemon the Thirteenth

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: One rainy afternoon, a man seeks Lupin's help on behalf of a young woman. The woman is actually Fujiko, who is after a diamond known as "The Star of Killamanjaro". The diamond was implanted into the chest of a mob boss.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Three scrolls contain the secret of creating a blade like the Zantetsuken. Lupin wants to steal them as a matter of family pride because his grandfather, Arsene Lupin, stole them back in the 19th century.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Napoleon once owned a deck of fortune-telling cards that are now in the hands of a millionaire known as Mr. Gold. Lupin plans to steal them during Mr. Gold's birthday party, and Zenigata plans to stop him. Lupin succeeds in stealing the mysterious cards.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang aim to steal the blueprints for a new computer. In their way is a man skilled with the machinegun and his hit-man partner named Poon, who used to be Fujiko's partner in the past.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone is posing as Lupin and blowing up bridges, causing a lot of damage and injuries. Lupin and Jigen discover that the bomber is trying to force an armored car to travel along a route of his choosing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Mamo Kyosuke claims that Lupin will disappear from the world in four days. He claims that he is a time traveler from 2874 seeking revenge. Apparently, Lupin XIII destroyed the Mamo clan on March 2874.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are both after the legendary Eye of the Nile emerald. It is going to be a wedding gift presented at a wedding being held on a yacht.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Zenigata has been invited to an international police convention in Europe; his chief wants him to go, but Zenigata does not want to since Lupin has declared that he will steal a gold bust within the next three days.
programme.sub-title: Let's Catch Lupin and Go to Europe

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko goads Lupin into stealing a large shipment of diamonds. Lupin takes the task despite Jigen's protest that Fujiko is playing them for fools. Of course, Jigen is right.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko invites Lupin and the gang to a famous nightclub owned by the sexy Hoshikage Rinko. Only Goemon refuses. This was a wise move as Rinko places timebombs on Fujiko, Jigen, and Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Smith is an art thief that is selling stolen paintings under the guise of a beauty contest. Lupin decides he wants in on the action as well, promising to steal away the treasured paintings.
programme.sub-title: Keep an Eye On the Beauty Contest

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Inspector Ganimard III is the grandson of Lupin I's archnemesis. He has come to Japan as the head of security for the 1972 France Fair but also intends to restore his family's honor by arresting Lupin III.
programme.sub-title: Which of the Third Generation Will Win!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone is committing thefts under Lupin's name. Lupin follows the imposters back to their island hideout. He has apparently stumbled into a whole island of thieves.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Rie is being held captive though she does not realize it. She believes the man holding her is a friend of her father, Ken Makita. Lupin shows up to rescue her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Gordon, an FBI computer specialist, is in Japan to operate a computer capable of predicting crimes and determining how to stop them. The Metropolitan Police Department hopes that this will finally help them capture Lupin.
programme.sub-title: The First Move Wins Computer Operation!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A disputed horde of recently discovered ancient gold coins draws the attention of Lupin and company. As the ownership of the coins is disputed, Lupin decides to settle the matter on his own by stealing them from the Dai Nippon Bank.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Bye Bye, Lady Liberty
programme.desc: Foiled repeatedly by the predictions of Interpol's supercomputer, professional looter Lupin III has settled down. A sinister secret organization and a young computer genius are thrown into the mix. And whose side is the buxom Fujiko on this time?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Hemingway Papers
programme.desc: The legendary last manuscript of the great Ernest Hemingway tells of a buried treasure on an island far away and thief extraordinaire Lupin is on the trail! But he gets caught up in a local civil war, Lupin will have to keep his wits or risk his life!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Napoleon's Dictionary
programme.desc: Lupin learns of his grandfather's secret treasure, supposedly hidden in the pages of a dictionary previously owned by Napoleon Bonaparte! Said dictionary just happens to be the prize in a cross-country classic car race.

programme.title: Accident Man, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mike is a tough hitman, who makes his hits look like accidents or suicide. He's in a gang of hitmen, each with his own style. When his loved ex is killed, Mike looks for those responsible.

programme.title: Accident Man: Hitman's Holiday, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: A hit man must beat the top assassins in the world.

programme.title: Timecop, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

programme.title: Rollerball, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: Jonathan Cross (Chris Klein) is an all-American hotshot, the most popular player in the fastest and most extreme sport of all time: Rollerball.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Attack the Block, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: ATTACK THE BLOCK is a fast, funny, frightening action adventure movie that pits a teen street gang against an invasion of savage alien monsters. It turns a crazy mix of tough street kids into a team of kick ass heroes.

programme.title: The Mortal Instruments, (2013, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Clary's life is turned upside down when her mother is kidnapped and it's revealed that they are shadowhunters who are tasked with protecting the world from vampires, werewolves and demons. Clary must discover her talents and save her mother.

programme.title: The Fifth Element, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Milla Jovovich, and Gary Oldman star in acclaimed director Luc Besson's outrageous sci-fi adventure, an extravagantly styled tale of good against evil set in an unbelievable twenty-third century world.

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers, (1959, Action)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: Trail To San Antone, (1947, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry tries to help a young jockey get back on track after an accident arranged by a horse trainer ruins his career. Action-packed adventure with fantastic stunts, and Gene Autry's Champion.

programme.title: Twilight On The Rio Grande, (1947, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry's investigation of the murder of his partner, leads him to Mexico, where he becomes involved with the beautiful singer whose father has also been killed, and finds a jewelry smuggling ring.

programme.title: Valley Of Fire, (1951, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry is the new mayor of a lawless town. He has to rid the town of its gambling king and to import a group of gals to settle the men. Gene must out-gun renegades who want to kidnap the gals.

programme.title: The Kentuckian, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: Eli Wakefield (Burt Lancaster) and his son are Kentucky adventurers longing for life on the Texas frontier. They learn, however, that their greatest challenge lies not in the uncharted wilderness, but in the people they meet along the way.

programme.title: Fort Yuma, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: When a revered Apache chief is brutally murdered en route to Fort Yuma to negotiate a peace treaty, all-out war erupts in this rousing -- and surprisingly touching -- western starring Peter Graves and directed by the legendary Lesley Selander.

programme.title: Along Came Jones, (1945, Drama)
programme.desc: Gary Cooper gives a marvelous, tongue-in-cheek performance as a fumble-fingered cowpoke who is mistaken for a notorious bandit and almost gets killed by both sides of the law...all while managing to capture the attention of Loretta Young.

programme.title: Support Your Local Gunfighter, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: James Garner is back in the saddle again as hustler Latigo Smith whose latest con is passing off cowhand Jug (Jack Elam) as the dreaded gunman Swifty Morgan. But when the real Swifty shows up, the Wild West is going to get a whole lot wackier!

programme.title: Support Your Local Gunfighter, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: James Garner is back in the saddle again as hustler Latigo Smith whose latest con is passing off cowhand Jug (Jack Elam) as the dreaded gunman Swifty Morgan. But when the real Swifty shows up, the Wild West is going to get a whole lot wackier!

programme.title: Duel at Diablo, (1966, Drama)
programme.desc: Frontier scout Jess Remsberg leads a wagon train through hostile territory to Fort Conchos. But underneath his valor, he has an ulterior motive: to settle a score with the man he believes killed his wife. James Garner and Sidney Poitier star.

programme.title: Gladiator, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: The Great Raid, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: As World War II rages, the elite 6th Ranger Battalion is given a mission of heroic proportions: push 30 miles behind enemy lines and liberate over 500 American prisoners of war.

programme.title: Tigerland, (2000, Drama)
programme.desc: As a nation stands divided over the war in Vietnam, stark differences of opinion surface among the men of A-Company, triggering unexpected and far-reaching consequences.

programme.title: Gladiator, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: The Great Raid, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: As World War II rages, the elite 6th Ranger Battalion is given a mission of heroic proportions: push 30 miles behind enemy lines and liberate over 500 American prisoners of war.

programme.title: The Art of War, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: UN's secretary general uses covert operations to help diplomacy along. Shaw's called back 6 months after one such operation. He witnesses the murder of Chinese UN ambassador at UN, NYC, chases the assassin and ends up a suspect.

programme.title: The Art of War II: Betrayal, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Agent Neil Shaw returns in the no holds barred action adventure sequel. When Shaw is called out of retirement as a Hollywood film consultant by the murder of his long-time martial arts mentor, 'Mother.'

programme.desc: Kaolinite has a new target: Makoto. When Haruka and Michiru find out, they decide to use Makoto as bait in order to obtain her talisman.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Reis been spending the past several nights chanting to learn the meaning behind the strange nightmares shes been having.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Seeing the happy couples around her, Minako starts questioning her life as a Sailor Guardian and the sacrifices she has to make.
programme.sub-title: I Want to Quit Being a Sailor Guardian: Minako's Dilemma

programme.title: A Espada De Deus - A ltima Cruzada
programme.desc: Dois cavaleiros cristos chegam a uma ilha remota com a inteno de converter os aldees pagos sua religio. programme.desc: O que voc faria se tivesse que arriscar a prpria vida para salvar a de outros? Este foi o grande dilema que a jovem rainha Ester teve que enfrentar.

programme.desc: O rei do Egito avisado da profecia de que Messias chegar. Para evitar que o inimigo sobreviva, ele ordena que matem todos os bebs do sexo masculino.

programme.title: Bons Pra Cachorro
programme.desc: Uma histria de amizade e aventura entre Josh, um co do campo desalinhado, descontrado e amigvel, e Cassie, uma cadela mimada da cidade, que no gosta da vida no campo. programme.title: O Cachorro que salvou o Vero
programme.desc: Quando o co Zeus destri uma importante festa da famlia Bannister, ele enviado para uma escola de treinamento. As crianas Bannister contam com a ajuda de um treinador, que tem seus prprios mtodos de treinamento. Ser que as novas habilidades de Zeus podero ajud-lo a frustrar um trio de ladres desastrados determinados a fazer deste um vero irritante?

Quando um estranho monstro surge na cidade e comea a transformar as pessoas em zumbis, eles decidem se tornar heris e embarcam em uma jornada para salvar a Terra.

programme.title: Fuga
programme.desc: Dez anos depois que a peste negra devastou seu pais, uma pobre familia viaja em busca de melhores condicoes de vida. Em uma passagem deserta nas montanhas, eles sao atacados por uma gangue de crueis fora-da-lei, que so poupa Signe, uma garota de 19 anos.

programme.title: A Maldio da Floresta
programme.desc: Adam e Clare se mudam para uma rea rural com seu filho recm-nascido. Eles logo comeam a receber avisos sobre espritos malignos na regio, mas a jovem famlia prefere apreciar a beleza da floresta.

programme.title: O Monstro Dentro de Voce
programme.desc: Em uma comunidade desolada, repleta de viciados, aps uma noite louca, Lou acorda com sintomas de uma doena.

programme.title: Ouija Exorcismo
programme.desc: Em 1985, um exorcista famoso prendeu um demnio horrvel dentro de um tabuleiro Ouija. Pensando que o tabuleiro era um jogo, seu filho jogou sem obedecer s regras e soltou o demnio.

programme.title: Siembamba: A Cano Do Mal
programme.desc: O choro incessante do seu beb, sentimentos crescentes de culpa e paranoia levam Chloe a uma depresso sombria. Desorientada, ela visita o psiclogo, Dr. Timothy Reed, que diagnostica seus pensamentos e sentimentos como depresso ps-parto. O mundo ao seu redor implode e fica claro que ela e seu filho esto em perigo iminente. Mas de qu?

programme.title: Shark Season
programme.desc: Um grande tubaro branco persegue incansavelmente trs praticantes de caiaque em uma ilha remota. Enquanto esperam pela chegada de ajuda, a mar comea a subir, forando-os a voltar para as guas mortais. Agora a corrida comeou enquanto o tubaro ameaa abat-los no caminho de volta ao continente.

programme.title: Em Campo Minado
programme.desc: Em setembro de 2006 no Afeganisto, trs jovens soldados britnicos so enviados para dispersar um bloqueio Talib, mas ao passarem pelo leito de um rio, um dos patrulheiros pisa em uma mina, deixada pela ocupao russa 25 anos atrs. Seus colegas pedem ajuda para resgatar o rapaz, que pode morrer ou ficar gravemente ferido. Mas logo que o reforo chega, eles descobrem que esto cercados por minas e que qualquer movimento em falso pode ser fatal.

programme.title: Assassinos Annimos
programme.desc: A tenso est insuportvel dentro do Assassinos Annimos, um grupo de apoio para matadores, quando todos esto tentando descobrir qual deles est por trs de um atentado contra um importante senador.

programme.title: Flypaper
programme.desc: Una extraa coincidencia hace que dos bandas atraquen el mismo banco a la misma hora. Un peculiar cliente (Patrick Dempsey) y una resuelta cajera (Ashley Judd) pondrn en juego su ingenio y su valor para intentar frustrar el golpe.

programme.title: Blitz
programme.desc: Blitz um serial killer londrino que est matando policiais. O inspetor-chefe Roberts e o sargento Brant, um detetive de polcia duro, intransigente e politicamente incorreto, tm a tarefa de tentar deter o psicopata. Parece que Blitz comete os crimes para se tornar uma estrela dos tabloides - quanto mais ele mata, mais famoso se torna.

programme.title: Redeno
programme.desc: Histria do ex-motoqueiro e traficante Sam Childers, que tornou-se um grande lutador em defesa das crianas do Sudo, obrigadas a virar soldados muito antes de se tornarem homens. O sujeito se dedica com paixo s crianas e acaba deixando um pouco de lado sua vida nos Estados Unidos, onde tem esposa e filha. Conhecido como "pastor da metralhadora", ele no tem problema em pegar em armas para defender o que pensa.

programme.title: O Relutante Fundamentalista
programme.desc: Um jovem paquistans se v em um conflito entre seu sonho americano, uma crise de refns e sua terra natal.

programme.title: Stretch
programme.desc: Um motorista luta para pagar uma dvida. Ele assume um trabalho com um passageiro louco e perigoso.

programme.desc: Um jovem imigrante chega ao Canad e se envolve com uma organizao criminosa online chamada Darkweb.

programme.title: A Filha do Meu Melhor Amigo
programme.desc: A amizade duradoura entre as famlias Walling e Ostroff testada quando Nina, a filha prdiga de Ostroff, volta para casa nas frias aps uma ausncia de cinco anos e inicia um caso com David, chefe da famlia Walling.

programme.title: Magia ao Luar
programme.desc: Uma comdia romntica sobre um ingls trazida para ajudar a desmascarar uma possvel fraude. Surgem complicaes pessoais e profissionais

programme.title: Conduo Perigosa
programme.desc: Peter Roberts (Thomas Jane), um ex-piloto de corrida automotiva, tornou-se instrutor de motorista e durante uma de suas aulas sequestrado por Simon Keller (John Cusack), que supostamente seria um aluno como qualquer outro. O sequestrador misterioso fora ele a participar de um crime que coloca ambos na mira da polcia e da mfia, desencadeando uma perseguio.

programme.title: Perdido na Fama
programme.desc: Turk Henry (Antonio Banderas) um astro de rock com uma agenda atribulada de shows e entrevistas. Buscando um pouco de recluso para desfrutar de bons momentos com sua esposa, Sheila (Olga Kurylenko), os dois decidem passar algumas semanas de frias no Chile. Uma excurso inocente para as floretas chilenas acabam levando ao sequestro de Sheila por um grupo de possveis terroristas que, ironicamente, so fs de Turk Henry.

programme.title: #Nmero da Sorte
programme.desc: A vida de um jovem est em uma mar de derrotas, at que ele obtm o antigo nmero do celular de um grande astro do basquete apelidado de "O Santo" e comea a us-lo para obter acesso VIP a festas de alto nvel. Ele est vivendo uma vida boa... At que seu dolo descubra.

programme.title: Ataque dos Zumbis
programme.desc: Um empregado medocre de uma fabricante de armas precisa sobreviver ao caos dentro do escritrio quando seus colegas se transformam em manacos assassinos depois de tomarem uma misteriosa bebida.

programme.title: Uma Longa Queda
programme.desc: Na vspera de Ano Novo, quatro estranhos se encontram no telhado de um prdio conhecido por suicdios.

programme.title: S.O.S Mulheres ao Mar 2
programme.desc: Adriana, uma escritora bem-sucedida, segue feliz em seu romance com Andr, que est prestes a lanar sua mais nova coleo de moda durante um cruzeiro pelo Caribe. Ao saber que a ex-noiva dele vai acompanh-lo na viagem em busca de uma reconciliao, Adriana chama suas fiis escudeiras Luzia e Dialinda para embarcar no navio com eles.

programme.title: Siga seu corao
programme.desc: Kathy uma escritora de sucesso. Quando ela volta, se lembra de sua vida antes de deixar a comunidade Amish.

programme.title: Marjorie Prime
programme.desc: Um servio que oferece recriaes hologrficas de entes queridos falecidos permite que uma mulher fique cara a cara com a verso mais jovem de seu falecido marido.

programme.title: Amor, Felicidade Ou Casamento
programme.desc: Uma terapeuta de casais, feliz no casamento, descobre que os pais esto se divorciando e tudo sai do controle.

programme.title: Suite Francesa
programme.desc: Frana, 1940. Enquanto espera por notcias do marido, um prisioneiro de guerra, a bela Lucile leva uma vida reprimida com sua sogra controladora. Mas em breve, um regimento de soldados germnicos instalados nas casas dos camponeses. No inicio, Lucile tenta ignorar Bruno, o refinado oficial alemo que estava com elas, mas depois, um amor forte atrai-los e leva-os a tragdia da guerra.

programme.title: A Tentao
programme.desc: Gavin Nichols (Charlie Hunnam) um jovem que est na beira de um edifcio, ameaando pular. O detetive Hollis Lucetti (Terrence Howard) enviado para impedi-lo e, ao conversar com ele, descobre que Gavin est sendo forado a pular antes do meio dia. A conversa faz com que Gavin e Hollis exponham seus pontos de vista religiosos, em um verdadeiro embate sobre questes filosficas.

programme.title: Enquanto Houver Esperana
programme.desc: Esta a histria de Anglica, uma garota de 16 anos que est lutando contra um tipo raro de cncer chamado Sndrome Mielodisplsica, sua luta para tentar viver uma vida normal e sua esperana de encontrar seu primeiro amor antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: Preciso ser pai
programme.desc: Se os vinte anos so a poca da diverso, ento Jonah entende bem do assunto, at que ele recebe um diagnstico de que ficar infrtil em um ms. De repente, o garoto festeiro muda completamente suas prioridades. Ele tenta congelar o esperma, mas quando isso d errado, s restam trs semanas de fertilidade para Jonah.

programme.title: Samurai X - O Fim De Uma Lenda
programme.desc: Shishio partiu em seu navio blindado para derrubar o governo Meiji e devolver o Japo ao caos, levando Kaoru com ele. Para det-lo a tempo, Kenshin treina com seu antigo mestre para aprender sua tcnica final.

programme.title: O ltimo Guarda-Costas
programme.desc: O gngster Mitchell decide mudar de profisso ao sair da priso e abandonar o mundo do crime. Ele contratado como segurana de Charlotte, uma complicada jovem atriz que tenta levar uma vida reclusa.

programme.title: Perigo em Bangkok
programme.desc: Joe um assassino que est na Tailndia para realizar quatro assassinatos sob encomenda. Os alvos so inimigos de Surat, um chefo do crime local. Para no ter que realizar o trabalho sozinho ele contrata Kong, um batedor de carteiras.

programme.title: A Perseguio
programme.desc: Ottway trabalha em um lugar isolado no Alasca. Certo dia, quando retornava cidade para matar a saudade da esposa, o avio cai. Feridos e sem alimentos, os sobreviventes lutam pela vida e tentam reencontrar a civilizao.

programme.title: Shaft

programme.title: O super guerreiro, o Rob Kaima Skraid, j foi uma vez banido pelo Imperador Crisis e General Jark de suas operaes por perder o controle e no respeitar ordens devido a seu imenso poder destrutivo. Gatezon pretende reconstru-lo para confrontar RX.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX - S1E11

programme.title: O Feiticeiro Kaima Cerebron capaz de entrar nos sonhos das pessoas e manipular suas mentes. Com isso, o prximo alvo do Imprio Crisis nada mais que a prpria Reiko, fazendo-a atacar e temer Issamu.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX - S1E12

programme.title: Parecia ser um presente vindo dos cus... Uma bela garota, Kirara, junta de seu pai, aparecem dos cus, Shigeru e Kengo veem tudo.

programme.title: H uma conspirao em curso no Forte Crisis. Maribaron executa uma misso que consiste sequestrar uma jovem garota para se transformar na Princesa Garonia, tentando enganar desde o Imperador Crisis at mesmo o General Jark e os outros quatro comandantes.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX - S1E14

programme.title: Issamu est desesperadamente em busca de Hitomi, que foi levada para o Mundo Kaima. O que o aguarda l uma perigosa armadilha criada por Maribaron.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX - S1E15

programme.title: Um homem misterioso surge diante de Issamu, que est em busca de Hitomi. Ele se chama Joe Kazumi, que fugiu do Imprio Crisis.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX - S1E16

programme.title: Issamu, Joe e Shigeru so capturados e levados para o templo da Princesa Garonia. Maribaron ordena que Joe e Shigeru sejam eliminados.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX - S1E17

programme.title: Patriot Games (1992)
programme.desc: An IRA terrorist (Sean Bean) vows revenge against the ex-CIA agent (Harrison Ford) who killed the mans brother and thwarted an attack on royalty.

programme.title: Jack Reacher (2012)
programme.desc: A defense attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who apparently murdered five people at random.

programme.title: Frank Millers Sin City (2005)
programme.desc: Lawmen, prostitutes (Devon Aoki, Alexis Bledel), a hulking thug and other sordid characters run amok in a crime-ridden metropolis.

programme.title: The Collector (2009)
programme.desc: A desperate man plans to break into his wealthy employers house, then learns that another thief has beaten him to it and rigged the place with deadly traps.

programme.title: The Autopsy of Jane Doe (2016)
programme.desc: When father and son coroners investigate the death of a beautiful "Jane Doe," they find increasingly bizarre clues.

programme.title: The Mist (2007)
programme.desc: Trapped townspeople (Thomas Jane, Marcia Gay Harden, Laurie Holden) face monsters inside and out after a supernatural fog engulfs their Maine community.

programme.title: Eagle Eye (2008)
programme.desc: Two strangers (Shia LaBeouf, Michelle Monaghan) become pawns of a mysterious woman who threatens their friends and family and uses technology to control their actions.

programme.title: Road to Perdition (2002)
programme.desc: Accompanied by his eldest son, a Depression-era mob enforcer (Tom Hanks) seeks revenge after the rest of his family are murdered by his employers (Paul Newman) jealous son.

programme.title: The Gambler (2014)
programme.desc: A literature professor (Mark Wahlberg) with gambling debts borrows money from a mobster (Michael Kenneth Williams) and offers his life as collateral while immersing himself in an illicit, underground world.

programme.title: Hostage (2005)
programme.desc: A former hostage negotiator (Bruce Willis) must take action when three carjackers hold a wealthy man (Kevin Pollak) and his children at gunpoint.

programme.title: First Blood (1982)
programme.desc: Green Beret veteran Rambo (Sylvester Stallone) takes on a Pacific Northwest sheriff (Brian Dennehy) and the National Guard.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.desc: Archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford) rescues his kidnapped father (Sean Connery), and the two race the Nazis to find the Holy Grail.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma (2007)
programme.desc: A rancher (Christian Bale) and the captive outlaw (Russell Crowe) in his charge learn to respect each other on a dangerous journey to catch a train.

programme.title: Red (2010)
programme.desc: Retired CIA agents (Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman, John Malkovich) reassemble for survival after the agency sends assassins to silence them and the secrets they carry.

programme.title: The Nice Guys (2016)
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck private eye (Ryan Gosling) works with a hired enforcer (Russell Crowe) to investigate the disappearance of a young woman (Margaret Qualley) in 1977 Los Angeles.

programme.title: Tigerland (2000)
programme.desc: A recruit (Colin Farrell) tries to get discharged from infantry training for Vietnam at Fort Lake, La., in 1971.

programme.title: Pele: Birth of a Legend (2016)
programme.desc: Under guidance from manager Vicente Feola (Vincent DOnofrio), young Pele (Kevin de Paula) utilizes his street soccer skills to lead Brazil to the World Cup in 1958.

programme.title: On the Edge (2022)
programme.desc: A metro driver witnesses his son die and sets out to track down those who are responsible.

programme.title: What Remains (2022)
programme.desc: A small town pastor is forced to reckon with an act of forgiveness when the convict he forgave for murdering his wife returns to town five years later, while the town sheriff investigates another murder that may be related.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October (1990)
programme.desc: Moscow, Washington and a CIA analyst (Alec Baldwin) track a renegade Soviet captain (Sean Connery) and his new submarine.

programme.title: Ida Red (2021)
programme.desc: Crime boss Ida "Red" Walker turns to her son, Wyatt, to pull off one last heist to get out of prison. However, with the FBI closing in, Wyatt must soon choose between family and freedom.

programme.title: Freedoms Path (2022)
programme.desc: When Union soldier William runs from battle, hes taken to safety by a heroic young Black man. Kitch is part of a secret community of freed slaves running a section of the Underground Railroad, but a desperate slave catcher is on their trail.

programme.title: Defiance (2008)
programme.desc: In 1941 three refugee brothers (Daniel Craig, Liev Schreiber, Jamie Bell) turn a daily struggle to survive into a personal battle to save their people from the Nazis.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October (1990)
programme.desc: Moscow, Washington and a CIA analyst (Alec Baldwin) track a renegade Soviet captain (Sean Connery) and his new submarine.

programme.title: Good Kill (2014)
programme.desc: An Air Force drone pilot (Ethan Hawke) begins to question the ethics of dropping bombs on Afghanistan from the safety of his post in Las Vegas.

programme.title: Panama (2022)
programme.desc: A defense contractor hires an ex-marine to go to Panama to complete an arms deal. In the process, he becomes involved in the U.S. invasion of Panama.

programme.title: Mercy (2023)
programme.desc: An ex-military doctor finds herself in a fight for survival when the Irish mafia seizes control of the hospital at which she works. When her son is taken hostage, shes forced to rely on her battle-hardened past and lethal skills to save the day.

programme.title: Black Noise (2023)
programme.desc: When an elite security team is sent to a remote island to rescue a VIP, their mission takes a turn as they are confronted by masked gunmen. To keep hold of their lives, the team must act quickly to assess the situation and escape the island.

programme.title: 6 Days (2017)
programme.desc: In April 1980, gunmen storm the Iranian Embassy in London. Highly trained SAS operatives prepare a counterattack, hoping to end the hostage situation in one swift blow.

programme.title: Outlaw Posse (2024)
programme.desc: In 1908 an outlaw returns from years of hiding in Mexico to claim stolen gold hidden in the hills of Montana.

programme.title: The Score (2021)
programme.desc: Two small-time crooks drive to a secluded cafe for a big score.

programme.title: Agent Game (2022)
programme.desc: A CIA officer becomes the target of a rendition operation after being the scapegoat for the death of an interrogation subject.

programme.title: Breathe (2024)
programme.desc: Maya and her young daughter are forced to live underground when Earth is left uninhabitable due to a lack of oxygen. They soon find themselves in a fight for survival when a mysterious couple arrive and claim to know the fate of Mayas husband.

programme.title: Lions for Lambs (2007)
programme.desc: The experiences of two soldiers in Afghanistan ties together separate stories unfolding in California and Washington, D.C.

programme.title: The Four Feathers (2002)
programme.desc: Accused of cowardice for resigning when assigned to a dangerous post, a former British soldier (Heath Ledger) tries to help his old regiment fight rebels in Africa.
